value.title: I challenged myself to do the FASTEST BCs EVER | PiG's Filthy Adventures #16 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: After the success of my Fastest Nydus Swarm Host build, I wanted to see if I could replicate it with the Fastest Battlecruisers Ever. This is NOT effective at all, so can I actually steal anyone's MMR with it?
